summary: The Acupuncture for Our Seniors Act of 2025 amends the Social Security Act to provide Medicare coverage for acupuncturist services. It defines "qualified acupuncturist services" and "qualified acupuncturist," outlining eligibility based on state licensure or national certification. The bill modifies payment rules, including updates to the physician fee schedule and separate payment for services from institutional providers. It also addresses billing in inpatient hospital settings and sets an effective date for the changes.
